description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application providing utility endpoints such as a welcome page, health check, documentation redirect, and application info. The controller uses Swagger annotations for API documentation and serves an HTML page with thematic styling.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing utility endpoints such as a welcome message, health check, API documentation redirect, and application info, with themed HTML content.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a themed HTML page as a welcome message for the To-Do backend API.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating application health.
